titleStmt.title: May ʾAnbäsa Däbrä Gännät Kidanä Mǝḥrät

place.placeName: May ʾAnbäsa Däbrä Gännät Kidanä Mǝḥrät
May ʾAnbäsa Kidanä Mǝḥrät / May ʾAnbäsa
place.settlement: wäräda ʾƎndärta, ṭabiya May ʾAnbäsa, qušät May Mǝʾri

note.ab: Gädam. At least 10 monks resided in the monastery at the moment of the visit. A nunnery ʾƎnda Maḥṣun, dedicated to ʾabunä Maḥṣäntä Maryam, is located further down the valley of river Gǝwa. Ruins of other structures (churches or dwellings of monks?) are visible along the river valley. Tabots: large unidentified number, including Zärʾa Buruk, Maḥṣäntä Maryam, Abrǝham (of Qata) Kidanä Mǝḥrät, Täklä Haymanot, Zion (?), Mary, Yasay, Wäldä Tǝnśaʾe and others.
